activities:
xMatters uses contact Information, such as name, email address, mailing address, phone number, unique identifiers such as user name and password, information about your business such as company name and business type.  

We use this information to deliver notifications, emergency warnings and updates to individuals on the behalf of our Clients, send requested product or service information, respond to customer service requests, administer user account, send users marketing communications.
